channel.title: Kimball County|Nebraska|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Kimball County|Nebraska|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 West - Milemarker 6
item.description: Milemarker 6 on I-80 West in Kimball County, Nebraska.

item.title: End NE-53C Link South at I-80 East
item.description: End NE-53C Link South at I-80 East to Sidney.

item.title: NE-53C Link South at I-80
item.description: NE-53C Link South at I-80 (Exit 8)

item.title: NE-53C Link South Approaching I-80
item.description: NE-53C Link South approaching I-80. Use I-80 west to Cheyenne, WY; I-80 east to Sidney.

item.title: NE-53C Link South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on NE-53C Link South. Distance to I-80.

item.title: US-30 East at NE-53C Link South - Bushnell
item.description: US-30 East at NE-53C Link South in Bushnell. Use NE-53C Link for I-80; continue east on US-30 for Kimball. Turn left for Bushnell.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching NE-53C Link South
item.description: US-30 East approaching NE-53C Link South to I-80

item.title: US-30 East at NE-53C Link South
item.description: US-30 East at NE-53C Link South to I-80

item.title: US-30 West at (NE-53B Link) To I-80
item.description: US-30 West at (NE-53B Link) To I-80. US-30 continues west towards Pine Bluffs (incorrectly signed as Bus. US-30). BL-80 begins at the Wyoming-Nebraska state line, but is not signed on the Nebraska side of the border.

item.title: US-30 West at NE-53C Link/To I-80
item.description: US-30 West at NE-53C Link/To I-80 in Bushnell.

item.title: US-30 West at NE-53C Link
item.description: US-30 West at NE-53C Link south to I-80. Turn right on Birch St. for Bushnell. Continue west on US-30 for Pine Bluffs, WY.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching NE-53C Link to I-80
item.description: US-30 West approaching NE-53C Link to I-80 in Bushnell.

item.title: US-30 West - Bushnell
item.description: Entering Bushnell on US-30 West. Population 124.

item.title: US-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 west. Distance to Bushnell and Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: US-30 West at Chestnut Street
item.description: US-30 West at Chestnut Street in Kimball. Turn left on Chestnut Street for I-80.

item.title: NE-53E Link North at US-30
item.description: NE-53E Link North at US-30. Turn right on US-30 for Dix; left for Kimball.

item.title: NE-71 North Approaching NE-53E Link
item.description: NE-71 North approaching NE-53E Link. Use NE-53E Link North for Kimball; continue north on NE-71 for Scottsbluff and Gering.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22 Offramp at NE-71
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 22 offramp at NE-71. Turn right for NE-71 North/To US-30.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22 Offramp at NE-71
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 22 offramp at NE-71. Turn right on NE-71 for Kimball, Gering, and Scottsbluff.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 22 - Kimball East Entrance.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 22 - NE-71 North/Scottsbluff/Gering.

item.title: I-80 West - Kimball Exits
item.description: Kimball Exits on I-80 West. E Entrance - NE-71 North and W Entrance - NE-71 South.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 29
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 29 - NE-53A Link/Dix.

item.title: I-80 West - Kimball County
item.description: Entering Kimball County on I-80 west.

item.title: NE-71 South - Kimball County
item.description: NE-71 south in Kimball County, Nebraska.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 1 - NE-53B Link/Pine Bluffs. This is the last exit on I-80 west in Nebraska.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 8
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 8 - NE-53C Link/Bushnell. Next exit along I-80 west is 9 miles, at Pine Bluffs.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to NE-53C Link/Bushell Exit and Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 20 Gore
item.description: Exit 20 gore on I-80 west. This is a standard Nebraska exit gore sign.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 20
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 20 - NE-71 South/Kimball. NE-71 leaves I-80 westbound here.

item.title: NE-71 South at I-80
item.description: NE-71 south at I-80. Turn right for I-80 West/NE-71 South; continue under overpass for I-80 East.

item.title: NE-71 South at I-80
item.description: NE-71 south at I-80. Use I-80 West/NE-71 South for Cheyenne, WY; I-80 East for Sidney.

item.title: NE-71 South Approaching I-80
item.description: NE-71 south approaching I-80. NE-71 south joins I-80 west through Kimball.

item.title: End NE-53E Link at NE-71
item.description: End NE-53E Link at NE-71. Use NE-71 north for Gering and Scottsbluff. Use NE-71 south for I-80.

item.title: NE-53E Link - Roundabout
item.description: Roundabout on NE-53E Link. Enter roundabout for To NE-71 and I-80, Gering, and Scottsbluff. The roundabout only connects two segments of NE-53E Link. Notice the usage of the word I-80 instead of a shield.

item.title: US-30 East at NE-53E Link
item.description: US-30 east at NE-53E Link. Use NE-53E Link for NE-71 and I-80 (via NE-71).

item.title: Chestnut St. North Approaching US-30
item.description: Chestnut St. North approaching US-30 in Kimball. Chestnut St. used to be the route of NE-71 before it was rerouted east of town.

item.title: NE-71 North - Nebraska
item.description: Nebraska…The Good Life on NE-71 North. Taken at the Colorado-Nebraska stateline.

item.title: NE-71 North at I-80
item.description: NE-71 north at I-80.

item.title: End NE-53A Link at I-80
item.description: End NE-53ALink at I-80 Junction

item.title: NE-53A Link North at I-80 Exit 29 Onramp
item.description: NE-53A Link/I-80 Junction
